about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Spooky Workers. Discover first-hand through DEMO 1.0 a little more about Madama Bruna's House of Horrors and everything that happens inside.

Spooky Workers is a 2D indie puzzle-platform game that tells the story of Pedro, a scared young man who got an internship at Madama Bruna's House of Horrors.

In this free DEMO you can venture through 7 phases (in addition to the tutorial) and get a taste of what the life of a poor intern is like. 

Dress up a dinosaur head (that you made yourself) and scary all the customers. Think it's simple? Telma from Human Resources will demand a lot from you and demand a senior job (even though she earns a pittance).

Complete the 07 available phases by balancing the IDEAL TIME, collecting ALL THE ITEMS and scaring ALL THE CUSTOMERS (phew... I'm tired) to take a future step in your professional journey.

In total, 10 phases will be distributed, but it's still under development and will be updated in the coming months.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 520, 1 GB or AMD Radeon R7 240, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

short_description: Help Pedro Ricardo Jr. to scare all the customers at Madama Bruna's House of Horrors to stop being an intern and get your work card signed. Spooky Workers DEMO is an indie 2D puzzle-platform game that will surprise you.
